document.full_text: a program at texas tech takes artists and architects out of the classroom and onto the road for months, across 7,000 miles of the west, to use art as a way of thinking about land, environment and politics.
document.title: the american west as classroom, art and metaphor
lines_and_colors: a program at texas tech takes artists and architects out of the classroom and onto the road for months, across 7,000 miles of the west, to use art as a way of thinking about land, environment and politics.
